thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Alex M
thread.title_full: Nelson Alexander reviewed by Alex M

author: Alex M
title: Alex M
text: I've dealt with several property managers from various agencies and can honestly say that Nik Psevdos stands out from the rest. He goes above and beyond in displaying all the qualities that you'd expect as a client. When issues are raised he addresses them quickly, he is always responsive and provides excellent guidance on the Tenancies Act whilst being fair towards both landlord and tenant. He also puts a lot of effort to shortlist the best tenancy applicants. Would not only recommend him highly but would personally seek him out to manage future rental properties.
